resources.string: The goal of the game is to create a maze with 15 pieces of food, 3 bombs and any number of walls. The algorithm then tries to program the ant to complete the maze. The ant has no memory of where its been or what it has seen. It can only see directly in front of itself, can only move forward and rotate by 90 degrees in any direction. If the ant steps on a bomb it dies. If it eats all the pieces of food in a limited number of actions (250 rotations/movements) it wins. At the end of the calculation you are given the time it took for the algorithm to crack the maze. The number of iterations of the algorithm is limited and because of that the ant may sometimes fail to eat all the pieces of food.
Please put all 15 pieces of food on the map
